If you know of someone who has the items for donation, please contact Qhairah Qhaliesah (Case Manager) at 9177 6614 or Qhairahqhaliesah@thkmc.org.sg Since October 2011, THKMC was incorporated as a charity with an IPC status to provide multiple social and welfare services to the community at large. THKMC provides assistance to the Elderly, Families, Children & Youth, and Persons with Disabilities, through more than 70 programmes and services. THK Elderly Services Division provides many programmes and services to serve the elderly in need – one of which includes THK Cluster Support. THK Cluster Support provides social support through case management, monitoring, and basic counselling services to vulnerable seniors, and facilitates coordination in the provision of community-based care and support services to the seniors. This service aims to improve the quality of life of vulnerable seniors, particularly for low or no income seniors who are socially-isolated and have minimal or no family support.

Client has just moved in to their new 3-room HDB rental. Some appliances/furniture from their previous flat are spoilt/ rusty and family is in need of new ones.

If you have suitable item for donation, feel free to contact me at 92960569 or email me at muhammadsuffian@mws.sg

Thank you!

name: Halal rice cooker
description:
643 community hub is a space in the Yio Chu Kang neighbourhood where residents connect and build relationships with one another.

As the hub invites more and more residents to join us in our programs and initiatives, the hub is also starting to grow out of its rice cooker. The rice cooker we are currently holding on to is too small to support the number of residents that the hub is inviting. 

The community here at 643 community hub hopes that as the friends and community here at Yio Chu Kang grow, there will be a donor out there who is willing to give their rice cooker a second chance and donate it to 643 community hub.

contact.org: AMKFSC Community Services Ltd - Ang Mo Kio
contact.name: Andre Shia

name: Oven for baking
description:
A single mother, who was working with a social enterprise doing baking recently graduated from their program. She is keen on continuing to build her skills in baking and provide for her family of 3. She aspires to set up her own Home-based business and sell her bakes as a way to make ends meet. 

Call 9388 9473 for details on member, address and etc.

contact.org: AMKFSC Community Services Ltd - Ang Mo Kio
contact.name: Andre Shia

name: Single gas stove
description: Client is moving to her own rental flat. With her medical conditions, she is not able to work as she goes through treatment. Client requires a single gas stove so that she can cook simple meals for herself.

contact.org: Fei Yue Family Service Centre @ Bukit Batok
contact.name: Shannon Ong

name: Spice Grinder (small/medium size)
description: Low income Indian Muslim family is requesting for new or second-hand (good condition) Spice Grinder (small/medium size) for their cooking needs as their current one is spoilt. They use Spice Grinder for their cooking needs daily. Both client and her husband are not working due to health concerns and dependent on financial support and donor's assistance. Would appreciate if donor can cover transport costs too. Please contact social worker Seelvi at 86993152 if you are willing to help the family. Thank you.

contact.org: THK Family Service Centre @ Tanjong Pagar
contact.name: Lynette Tan

name: Stainless Steel Wok (36cm - Induction Friendly)
description: Our centre cooks for seniors in the morning. Most of our pans/woks have worn out. We would require a big wok to serve our big group of seniors. Preferably a stainless steel wok, but need to be induction friendly.

contact.org: MWS Senior Activity Centre - Fernvale Rivergrove
contact.name: Eileen Oon

name: Skool4kidz Uniform
description: Family has 8 school going children of which 2 are still in preschool. Last child is now  4years old and just recently transferred to a new preschool at Skool4kidz. Hence, mother hopes a kind donor able to provide new or pre-loved S size Skool4kidz female uniform. Child has only 1 set for now which is pre-loved.

name: Bermudas
description: Family of three with a 5-year-old living in a 1-room rental flat requires assistance in getting Bermudas for parents’ attire to work. Their current clothes are in poor condition with tears and holes. They do not have savings and have no support network to purchase a secondhand/new garments.

name: Jeans
description: Client is a father to 3 daughters aged 10, 4 and 8 months. Family, staying in a rental flat, is currently depending on financial assistance as client suffers from multiple medical conditions and that wife is the main caregiver to eldest daughter who suffers from a medical condition. The family is hoping to receive support to have new jeans size 38. For further liaison etc, kindly contact me at 98598768, thank you!

name: Adult T-Shirts (Long & Short Sleeve)
description: Client is a father to 3 daughters aged 10, 4 and 8 months. Family, staying in a rental flat, is currently depending on financial assistance as client suffers from multiple medical conditions and that wife is the main caregiver to eldest daughter who suffers from a medical condition. The family is hoping to receive support for new clothings for client (short-sleeve), and wife (long-sleeve), size 3xxl or 4xxl. For further liaison etc, kindly contact me at 98598768, thank you!

name: Girdle
description: Client is an expectant mother who will be raising her child by herself. She has limited family support and also has financial challenges after being terminated from her job midway through her pregnancy. Hence, Client needs help with securing baby essentials before the birth.
